labels.label: Dynamic REST based service invocation for update PC party address
Accept and Parse the Update Party Address Request
Process Life policy update party address (Message Interface)
Get Service end point for update PC party address.
Route Based on the Policy Type ( Split processing in case on multiple policies)
Update SOR system for PC policy.
Rest interface for PC party update

entry.value: Insert into demodb.tran_log values ( ?,'Completed',?,now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status ='Completed',creation_date=now();
